name: Amara Hanoi Hotel
address: 18 Phố Hàng Quạt, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
description:
Nằm tại vị trí thuận tiện ở trung tâm Hà Nội, Amara Hanoi Hotel cách Nhà hát múa rối Thăng Long 5 phút đi bộ và Hồ Hoàn Kiếm 600 m. Khách sạn 4 sao này có bàn bán tour. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, dịch vụ tiền sảnh và Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ.

Khách sạn sẽ cung cấp cho khách các phòng được trang bị điều hòa có bàn làm việc, ấm đun nước, tủ lạnh, minibar, két an toàn, TV màn hình phẳng và phòng tắm riêng với vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh. Tại Amara Hanoi Hotel, các phòng đều có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Hằng ngày, chỗ nghỉ có các lựa chọn thực đơn buffet, thực đơn à la carte hoặc kiểu lục địa cho bữa sáng. Tại chỗ nghỉ, khách sẽ tìm thấy nhà hàng phục vụ ẩm thực Mỹ, Pháp và Việt. Bên cạnh đó, họ có thể yêu cầu món chay, món thuần chay và không chứa gluten.

Các điểm tham quan nổi tiếng gần Amara Hanoi Hotel bao gồm Ô Quan Chưởng, Tràng Tiền Plaza và Nhà thờ Thánh Joseph. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Nội Bài, cách khách sạn 24 km.

review.rating: Tôi đã có 1 chuyến công tác thoải mái khi ở lại Amara.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Nhân viên rất nhiệt tình, thân thiện.
Luôn trả lời ngay khi tôi có thắc mắc.
Sẵn sàng phục vụ khi tôi có nhu cầu.
review.comment_negative:
Menu ăn sáng cần cải thiện.
Cửa mở của nhà tắm trong WC nên xem lại cách thiết kế, hơi bất tiện.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: All good

review.rating: This is a great hotel with friendly staff and good amenities. Would recommend.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: The hotel is in a great location in Hanoi. The staff are friendly and helpful. There is complimentary water and tea/coffee making facilities, which is a nice added bonus. The bed is very comfortable. The shower is good and the room was clean. I enjoyed my stay here.
review.comment_negative: No windows or natural light in the room.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: The staff where incredibly friendly and helpful. We arrived at 3:30am and this wasn't a problem as they got in touch before hand to confirm. The location is ideal for exploring the old quarter of hanoi. Would definitely recommend a stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Its location was great and the staff friendly

review.rating: Great hotel, very helpful and attentive staff.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Beautiful reception area, fantastic location, friendly staff
review.comment_negative: The room had no window and unfortunately the sound proofing in the rooms is very poor. I could hear every conversation from the next door room and fortunately they did not stay up late or make a lot of noise. When the lady was on the phone I could even hear the person she was talking to speaking.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: New hotel in old city centre, really comfortable bed, had a good sleep, friendly staff.
review.comment_negative: Could be cleaner for a new 4*  hotel eg. hair on sheets, stains on walls.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Everything was perfect. The hotel is very nice, room was big and clean, and Max was very helpful and nice. We booked cruise to Halong through the hotel and it was also cool.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: I like everything about this hotel…I will come again and again every time when I come in Vietnam. Max is super helpful, special thanks to him!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: I think that’s great. Great staff, great room, great location and beautiful restaurant!

review.comment_negative: Could be cleaner for a new 4*  hotel eg. hair on sheets, stains on walls.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Everything was perfect. The hotel is very nice, room was big and clean, and Max was very helpful and nice. We booked cruise to Halong through the hotel and it was also cool.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: I like everything about this hotel…I will come again and again every time when I come in Vietnam. Max is super helpful, special thanks to him!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: I think that’s great. Great staff, great room, great location and beautiful restaurant!

review.rating: Tôi đã có 1 chuyến công tác thoải mái khi ở lại Amara.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Nhân viên rất nhiệt tình, thân thiện.
Luôn trả lời ngay khi tôi có thắc mắc.
Sẵn sàng phục vụ khi tôi có nhu cầu.
review.comment_negative:
Menu ăn sáng cần cải thiện.
Cửa mở của nhà tắm trong WC nên xem lại cách thiết kế, hơi bất tiện.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: All good

review.rating: This is a great hotel with friendly staff and good amenities. Would recommend.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: The hotel is in a great location in Hanoi. The staff are friendly and helpful. There is complimentary water and tea/coffee making facilities, which is a nice added bonus. The bed is very comfortable. The shower is good and the room was clean. I enjoyed my stay here.
review.comment_negative: No windows or natural light in the room.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: The staff where incredibly friendly and helpful. We arrived at 3:30am and this wasn't a problem as they got in touch before hand to confirm. The location is ideal for exploring the old quarter of hanoi. Would definitely recommend a stay.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Its location was great and the staff friendly

review.rating: Great hotel, very helpful and attentive staff.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Beautiful reception area, fantastic location, friendly staff
review.comment_negative: The room had no window and unfortunately the sound proofing in the rooms is very poor. I could hear every conversation from the next door room and fortunately they did not stay up late or make a lot of noise. When the lady was on the phone I could even hear the person she was talking to speaking.
